Bay Boyfriends - Songs Yer Mom Taught Us demo 2015
Songs Yer Mom Taught Us demo 2015
Bay Boyfriends - Songs Yer Mom Taught Us demo 2015

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 12, 2015 Description from Terminal Escape:
Bare bones, no nonsense garage punk from Arkansas. Vocals perfectly tweaked and then reverbed just a little bit extra (for good measure), while the band plows through Goner jams galore. Raw, basic and a sound that is perfectly and intentionally dated. Sometimes you shouldn't have to think too much - sometimes simple is better....but I swear that "Little Girl" could be a crushing hardcore banger. SONGS YER MOM TAUGHT US
https://badboyfriends.bandcamp.com/
